author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: 'Grey's Anatomy' Fans Think This Is Proof That Meredith and Alex's Are Doing It
text:
Well, I guess it was bound to happen eventually!
Us Weekly points out that during last week's Grey's Anatomy episode, newcomer Eliza Minnick messed with the surgery board and Meredith wasn't pleased. And because Meredith couldn't control her mouth (surprise!), Miranda had to suspend her. But here comes the interesting part ‚Äî normally Mer would be upset about such a development, but she apparently didn't seem to mind all that much, and that has fans abuzz about the potential reason. And that potential reason is as follows: a hot and heavy makeout session with one Dr. Alex Karev . h!
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below I guess Meredith has more time to spend with Alex nowüëÄ #GreysAnatomy #merlex
‚Äî Chase Grey (@death_and_die) February 10, 2017 Alex and Meredith are already playing house...let's just do this! #GreysAnatomy #merex
‚Äî Devonna Stapleton (@DevoStapleton) February 10, 2017 So if Meredith is suspended this should mean more Alex time #GreysAnatomy bonding time üôÉ
‚Äî Wilmarie (@BeautyWilmarie) February 10, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below If you'll remember, the February 2 episode ended Alex in Meredith's bed, and so it just makes sense, right?
However, some people aren't so down with this potential pairing ‚Äî arguing that Meredith and Alex are basically related:
PEOPLE SHIP MEREDITH AND ALEX IM DECEASED THEYRE PRACTICALLY SIBLINGS PLEASE STOP THIS
‚Äî cam ü•Ä (@RlVERDALODGE) February 10, 2017 am i the only one who is PRAYING that alex and meredith dont end up together? they're like brother and sister. #GreysAnatomy
‚Äî ‚ùÖ (@ouromelia) February 10, 2017 I'm torn! I mean, yeah, they are basically brother and sister and this is gross. On the other hand, look what a brother-sister romance did for Game of Thrones .
